description: I want to be a Game Designer. I love creating immersive worlds and compelling stories. I enjoy problem-solving and finding innovative solutions to challenges. The idea of building entire universes and characters from scratch excites me. I thrive on collaboration but also appreciate independent work. I can be quite introspective, losing myself in my imagination for hours. However, I also enjoy the thrill of sharing my creations with others and seeing their reactions.

I want to be an Actor. I crave attention and love being the center of focus. I enjoy transforming into different characters and telling stories through emotions and body language. I am highly adaptable and can quickly change my demeanor to fit any situation. I thrive on feedback and constructive criticism. While I enjoy the spotlight, I also value deep connections with others and can be quite sensitive. I fear being typecast or overlooked.

I want to be an Interior Designer. I have a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating aesthetically pleasing spaces. I enjoy combining form and function to create harmonious environments. I am highly analytical and enjoy problem-solving. I value collaboration but also appreciate the autonomy to explore my creative vision. I can be quite perfectionistic and easily frustrated by limitations. I thrive on creating something tangible that people can appreciate.

I want to be a Novelist. I love the power of words to evoke emotions and transport readers to different worlds. I enjoy the solitude of writing and the freedom to explore my imagination. I am a deep thinker and often lose myself in thought. I value constructive criticism but can be sensitive to rejection. I crave recognition for my work but also fear being judged. I find inspiration in everyday life and enjoy observing people and their stories.
